alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:47PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Elmore and central Owyhee Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 147 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hot Spring to 8 miles southeast of Big Horse Basin Gap. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Brief heavy rains are also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bruneau and Bruneau Sand Dunes around 150 PM MDT. Chalk Hills and Big Horse Basin Gap around 200 PM MDT. Hinton Reservoir around 210 PM MDT. Mountain Home, Grand View, Mountain Home Air Force Base and C J Strike Dam around 220 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
